argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tgplacthmeo.1 | |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( A .+ x ) ) |
| 2 |  | tgplacthmeo.2 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tgplacthmeo.3 | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | tgplacthmeo.4 | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> G e. TopMnd ) |
| 6 | 4, 2 | #P_tmdtopon | |- ( G e. TopMnd -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 9 | 7, 7, 8 | #P_cnmptc | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 10 | 7 | #P_cnmptid | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> ( x e. X |-> x ) e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 | #P_cnmpt1plusg | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> ( x e. X |-> ( A .+ x ) ) e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( G e. TopMnd /\ A e. X ) -> F e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
